default.description: Set the network as the default external network

disable_port_security.description: Disable port security by default for ports created on this network

enable_port_security.description: Enable port security by default for ports created on this network

external.description: Set this network as an external network (external-net extension required)

internal.description: Set this network as an internal network

no_default.description: Do not use the network as the default external network

no_qos_policy.description: Remove the QoS policy attached to this network

no_share.description: Do not share the network between projects

no_tag.description: Clear tags associated with the network. Specify both --tag and --no-tag to overwrite current tags

project_id.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by id

project_name.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by name

provider_network_type.description: The physical mechanism by which the virtual network is implemented. For example: flat, geneve, gre, local, vlan, vxlan.

provider_physical_network.description: Name of the physical network over which the virtual network is implemented

provider_segment.description: VLAN ID for VLAN networks or Tunnel ID for GENEVE/GRE/VXLAN networks

qos_policy.description: QoS policy to attach to this network (name or ID)

tag.description: Tag to be added to the network (repeat option to set multiple tags)
